statements: SELECT * FROM patient_responses
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name FROM patient_responses
SELECT response_text FROM patient_responses WHERE treatment_name = 'Medication X'
SELECT * FROM patient_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, response_text FROM patient_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_responses WHERE response_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT treatment_name, COUNT(*) FROM patient_responses GROUP BY treatment_name;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM patient_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_responses WHERE response_text LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, response_date FROM patient_responses WHERE response_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Teleoncologists;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Teleoncologists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, specialty FROM Teleoncologists WHERE specialty='Oncology';
SELECT * FROM PatientResponses WHERE response_score > 5;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, response_date FROM PatientResponses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Teleoncologists WHERE specialty = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM Teleoncologists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Teleoncologists WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Teleoncologists WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Teleoncologists WHERE specialty = 'Hematology' OR specialty = 'Radiation Oncology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, response_date FROM Patients JOIN Responses ON Patients.patient_id = Responses.patient_id ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_age ASC, patient_name DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Responses.response_date FROM Patients JOIN Responses ON Patients.patient_id = Responses.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Responses.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Treatments.treatment_name = 'Surgery' ORDER BY Responses.response_date DESC;

SELECT Responses.response_id, Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Responses JOIN Patients ON Responses.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Responses.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Patients.patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, response_text FROM Patients JOIN Responses ON Patients.patient_id = Responses.patient_id WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Teleoncologists;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM Teleoncologists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT id, patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM Teleoncologists ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Teleoncologists WHERE specialization = 'Oncology';
SELECT Patients.id, Patients.name, Treatments.treatment_name, Treatments.cost FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.id = Treatments.id;

SELECT Patients.name, Treatments.treatment_name, PatientResponses.response FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.id = Treatments.id JOIN PatientResponses ON Patients.id = PatientResponses.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Teleoncologists WHERE location = 'New York' OR specialization = 'Hematology' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, cancer_type FROM PatientData ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_cost > 1000;
SELECT teleoncologist_name, specialization FROM Teleoncologist ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, response_score FROM TreatmentResponse WHERE response_score >= 4 ORDER BY response_score DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, cancer_type FROM PatientData ORDER BY cancer_type DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentPlan ON PatientData.treatment_id = TreatmentPlan.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, response_score FROM PatientData WHERE response_score > 50 ORDER BY response_score DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, feedback FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentResponse ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentResponse.patient_id ORDER BY response_date ASC;
